sentences.en: Finding a rug that's just the colour, size and price you want can be well-nigh impossible.
sentences.cn: 找到一块颜色、尺寸和价格都符合你要求的毛毯几乎是不可能的。

sentences.en: I bide my time and the hour of vengeance is nigh.
sentences.cn: 我在等待时机,报仇的时刻就要到了.

sentences.en: I had to pay nigh on forty pounds for it.
sentences.cn: 我不得不为它花了将近40英镑。

sentences.en: I've been one of your number one fans for nigh on three years now.
sentences.cn: 我一直是你的铁杆粉丝之一，到现在快3年了。

sentences.en: It's well nigh impossible to convince him.
That has been my stated policy well nigh two thousand years.
sentences.cn: 这也是我近2000年来的既定原则.

sentences.en: The end of the world may be nigh, but do we really care?
sentences.cn: 世界末日可能不远了，但我们真的在意吗？

sentences.en: The moment for the girl's setting out drove nigh.
sentences.cn: 那女孩子出发的时候越来越近了.

sentences.en: The near or nigh horse is the one on the left.
sentences.cn: 左侧马就是在左边的马.

sentences.en: The storm must still be nigh, she thought.
sentences.cn: 她想暴风雨必定仍会到来。

sentences.en: There were nigh on 40 people there.

sentences.cn: 它们都快要被杂草盖住了.

sentences.en: They've lived in that house for nigh on 30 years.
sentences.cn: 他们在那所房子里住了差不多30年了。

sentences.en: Two neighbors had been fighting each other for nigh on four decades.
sentences.cn: 两个邻居已经互相争斗了大约四十年.

sentences.en: You want me to clack that jaw, make you go nigh - nigh?
sentences.cn: 你想叫我, 把你的嘴闭上是 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 接近地，靠近地，几乎，在附近地
